channel.title: CVE Feed for Averta -- Master Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Averta -- Master Slider

item.title: CVE-2024-32600|2024-04-18T10:18:31.903Z -- Averta -- Master Slider
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Averta Master Slider.This issue affects Master Slider: from n/a through 3.9.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-32580|2024-04-18T09:25:44.695Z -- Averta -- Master Slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Averta Master Slider allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Master Slider: from n/a through 3.9.8.
